ygData.subject: Re: Simple Shin Shindig
ygData.msgSnippet: Hehe, one time my group was at the ghoul arch magi and the ghoul lord was uncamped so we were pulling him as well. Well, a pull went bad and we ended up with 2
ygData.messageBody:
Hehe, one time my group was at the ghoul arch magi and the ghoul lord
was uncamped so we were pulling him as well. Well, a pull went bad and
we ended up with 2 bok knights, several dars, kor wizards etc. I mass
feared them and called for evac, but our wizard just sat there. Knowing
we could last very long, I told the cleric to heal me full then gate,
the monk FD'd, and the other 2 party members were also able to gate.
What followed was me running while blaring mass fear with a HUGE train
through lower guk undead side. Because nothing was camped, it was
through full spawn. I unfortunately died about 100 feet to the zone line
from getting rooted, but you should have seen that overhead view of my
corpse - both boks still with me, 3-4 dars, a kor, several zols and
wans, all 5 greater ice bones (lol!) etc. The rest of the team,
fortunately all survived except for me. The wizard had gone afk without
telling anyone *sigh*, but what a memorable attempt at zoning that was.
At least the Corpse Recovery was easy for the cleric. =P

Ariell Thunderwolf, Karana

>
> nice, ghoul lord at zone. never seen that before.
>
